<div class="search search-box">
    <div class="searchinput" style="margin:0;">
        <input type="text" class="input-text" id="searchkey" name="searchkey" value="" style="width:270px;float:left"/>
        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />
        <span id="search-msg" style="font-size:14px; line-height:35px; padding-left:10px;"></span>
	    <p class="clear"></p>
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

<div class="search search-box">
    <div class="searchinput" style="margin:0;">
        <input type="text" class="input-text" id="searchkey" name="searchkey" value="" style="width:270px;float:left"/>
        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />
        <span id="search-msg" style="font-size:14px; line-height:35px; padding-left:10px;"></span>
	    <p class="clear"></p>
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>
    <div class="box">
        
        
        <br />
        本网站共公开披露<font color="red">1709</font>个投资事件，未公开披露投资事件<font color="red">41281</font>个，详情请查询<a href="http://www.pedata.cn/" target="_blank">清科私募通</a>。
        
    </div>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

			<dt class="box-l">
				<ul>
				<li class="first"><a href="#nav-fix" id="btn-left"></a><a href="javascript:void(0)" id="btn-right"></a><a href="http://www.pedaily.cn/" id="top-logo" class="logo"><img src="http://static.pedaily.cn/css/images/pedaily-logo.png" style="height: 40px;"><span>首页</span></a></li>

<div class="search search-box">
    <div class="searchinput" style="margin:0;">
        <input type="text" class="input-text" id="searchkey" name="searchkey" value="" style="width:270px;float:left"/>
        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />
        <span id="search-msg" style="font-size:14px; line-height:35px; padding-left:10px;"></span>
	    <p class="clear"></p>
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

			<dt class="box-l">
				<ul>

<div class="search search-box">
    <div class="searchinput" style="margin:0;">
        <input type="text" class="input-text" id="searchkey" name="searchkey" value="" style="width:270px;float:left"/>
        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />
        <span id="search-msg" style="font-size:14px; line-height:35px; padding-left:10px;"></span>
	    <p class="clear"></p>
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

        <input type="text" class="input-text" id="searchkey" name="searchkey" value="" style="width:270px;float:left"/>
        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />
        <span id="search-msg" style="font-size:14px; line-height:35px; padding-left:10px;"></span>
	    <p class="clear"></p>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>
    <div class="box">
        
        
        <br />
        本网站共公开披露<font color="red">1709</font>个投资事件，未公开披露投资事件<font color="red">41281</font>个，详情请查询<a href="http://www.pedata.cn/" target="_blank">清科私募通</a>。

<div class="box box-content">
<div class="new-caption"><h2 class="caption"><a target="_blank" href="/inv/">投资事件</a><span class="more">（以下所有数据均来自<a href="http://www.pedata.cn" target="_blank">清科私募通</a>）</span></h2></div>


<table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" border="0" width="100%" class="zdb-table zdb-inv-table">
    <tr>
        <th class="th1">受资方</th>
        <th class="th2">投资方</th>
        <th class="th3">所属行业</th>
        <th class="th4">投资金额</th>
        <th class="th5">投资时间</th>
        <th class="th6">详情</th>

<div class="box interview box-caption">

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

<div class="nav nav-fix" id="nav-fix" style="top: 60px;">

    <div class="searchinput" style="margin:0;">
        <input type="text" class="input-text" id="searchkey" name="searchkey" value="" style="width:270px;float:left"/>
        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />
        <span id="search-msg" style="font-size:14px; line-height:35px; padding-left:10px;"></span>
	    <p class="clear"></p>
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

    <div class="searchinput" style="margin:0;">
        <input type="text" class="input-text" id="searchkey" name="searchkey" value="" style="width:270px;float:left"/>
        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />
        <span id="search-msg" style="font-size:14px; line-height:35px; padding-left:10px;"></span>
	    <p class="clear"></p>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

    <h1>投资事件</h1>
    </div>
    
    <div class="box-content">
    <div class="search-tag">
        <div class="tag-l">
            <b>行业：</b><a class="forange" href="/inv/">不限</a>
        </div>
        <div class="tag-r">
            <a href="/inv/h5537/">互联网</a>
<a href="/inv/h4823/">移动互联网</a>
<a href="/inv/h690/">IT</a>

    <div class="searchinput" style="margin:0;">
        <input type="text" class="input-text" id="searchkey" name="searchkey" value="" style="width:270px;float:left"/>
        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />
        <span id="search-msg" style="font-size:14px; line-height:35px; padding-left:10px;"></span>
	    <p class="clear"></p>
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

    <h1>投资事件</h1>
    </div>
    
    <div class="box-content">
    <div class="search-tag">
        <div class="tag-l">
            <b>行业：</b><a class="forange" href="/inv/">不限</a>
        </div>

    <div class="searchinput" style="margin:0;">
        <input type="text" class="input-text" id="searchkey" name="searchkey" value="" style="width:270px;float:left"/>
        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />
        <span id="search-msg" style="font-size:14px; line-height:35px; padding-left:10px;"></span>
	    <p class="clear"></p>
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

    <h1>投资事件</h1>
    </div>
    
    <div class="box-content">
    <div class="search-tag">
        <div class="tag-l">
            <b>行业：</b><a class="forange" href="/inv/">不限</a>
        </div>
        <div class="tag-r">
            <a href="/inv/h5537/">互联网</a>
<a href="/inv/h4823/">移动互联网</a>
<a href="/inv/h690/">IT</a>

    <div class="searchinput" style="margin:0;">
        <input type="text" class="input-text" id="searchkey" name="searchkey" value="" style="width:270px;float:left"/>
        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />
        <span id="search-msg" style="font-size:14px; line-height:35px; padding-left:10px;"></span>
	    <p class="clear"></p>
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

<div class="box interview box-caption">

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

    <div class="searchinput" style="margin:0;">
        <input type="text" class="input-text" id="searchkey" name="searchkey" value="" style="width:270px;float:left"/>
        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />
        <span id="search-msg" style="font-size:14px; line-height:35px; padding-left:10px;"></span>
	    <p class="clear"></p>
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

        </div>
        <div class="tag-r">
            <a href="/inv/y2016/">2016</a><a href="/inv/y2015/">2015</a><a href="/inv/y2014/">2014</a><a href="/inv/y2013/">2013</a><a href="/inv/y2012/">2012</a><a href="/inv/y2011/">2011</a><a href="/inv/y2010/">2010</a><a href="/inv/y2009/">2009</a><a href="/inv/y2008/">2008</a><a href="/inv/y2007/">2007</a><a href="/inv/y2006/">2006</a><a href="/inv/y2005/">2005</a><a href="/inv/y2004/">2004</a>

<div class="search search-box">
    <div class="searchinput" style="margin:0;">
        <input type="text" class="input-text" id="searchkey" name="searchkey" value="" style="width:270px;float:left"/>
        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />
        <span id="search-msg" style="font-size:14px; line-height:35px; padding-left:10px;"></span>
	    <p class="clear"></p>
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>
    <div class="box">
        
        
        <br />
        本网站共公开披露<font color="red">1709</font>个投资事件，未公开披露投资事件<font color="red">41281</font>个，详情请查询<a href="http://www.pedata.cn/" target="_blank">清科私募通</a>。

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

    <div class="header">
	<div class="top" id="top">
		<dl class="main">
			<dt class="box-l">
				<ul>
				<li class="first"><a href="#nav-fix" id="btn-left"></a><a href="javascript:void(0)" id="btn-right"></a><a href="http://www.pedaily.cn/" id="top-logo" class="logo"><img src="http://static.pedaily.cn/css/images/pedaily-logo.png" style="height: 40px;"><span>首页</span></a></li>

<div class="search search-box">
    <div class="searchinput" style="margin:0;">
        <input type="text" class="input-text" id="searchkey" name="searchkey" value="" style="width:270px;float:left"/>
        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />
        <span id="search-msg" style="font-size:14px; line-height:35px; padding-left:10px;"></span>
	    <p class="clear"></p>
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

    <h1>投资事件</h1>
    </div>
    
    <div class="box-content">
    <div class="search-tag">
        <div class="tag-l">
            <b>行业：</b><a class="forange" href="/inv/">不限</a>
        </div>
        <div class="tag-r">
            <a href="/inv/h5537/">互联网</a>
<a href="/inv/h4823/">移动互联网</a>
<a href="/inv/h690/">IT</a>
<a href="/inv/h4973/">房地产</a>
<a href="/inv/h5044/">汽车</a>
<a href="/inv/h119/">连锁及零售</a>
<a href="/inv/h1154/">能源及矿产</a>
<a href="/inv/h1381/">广播电视</a>
<a href="/inv/h2164/">娱乐传媒</a>
