    <div class="searchinput" style="margin:0;">
        <input type="text" class="input-text" id="searchkey" name="searchkey" value="" style="width:270px;float:left"/>
        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />
        <span id="search-msg" style="font-size:14px; line-height:35px; padding-left:10px;"></span>
	    <p class="clear"></p>
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

    <div class="searchinput" style="margin:0;">
        <input type="text" class="input-text" id="searchkey" name="searchkey" value="" style="width:270px;float:left"/>
        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />
        <span id="search-msg" style="font-size:14px; line-height:35px; padding-left:10px;"></span>
	    <p class="clear"></p>
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

    <h1>投资事件</h1>
    </div>
    
    <div class="box-content">
    <div class="search-tag">
        <div class="tag-l">
            <b>行业：</b><a class="forange" href="/inv/">不限</a>
        </div>
        <div class="tag-r">
            <a href="/inv/h5537/">互联网</a>
<a href="/inv/h4823/">移动互联网</a>
<a href="/inv/h690/">IT</a>
<a href="/inv/h4973/">房地产</a>
<a href="/inv/h5044/">汽车</a>
<a href="/inv/h119/">连锁及零售</a>
<a href="/inv/h1154/">能源及矿产</a>
<a href="/inv/h1381/">广播电视</a>
<a href="/inv/h2164/">娱乐传媒</a>

    <div class="searchinput" style="margin:0;">
        <input type="text" class="input-text" id="searchkey" name="searchkey" value="" style="width:270px;float:left"/>
        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />
        <span id="search-msg" style="font-size:14px; line-height:35px; padding-left:10px;"></span>
	    <p class="clear"></p>
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

<div class="box interview box-caption">

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

<div class="search search-box">
    <div class="searchinput" style="margin:0;">
        <input type="text" class="input-text" id="searchkey" name="searchkey" value="" style="width:270px;float:left"/>
        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />
        <span id="search-msg" style="font-size:14px; line-height:35px; padding-left:10px;"></span>
	    <p class="clear"></p>
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

<div class="search search-box">
    <div class="searchinput" style="margin:0;">
        <input type="text" class="input-text" id="searchkey" name="searchkey" value="" style="width:270px;float:left"/>
        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />
        <span id="search-msg" style="font-size:14px; line-height:35px; padding-left:10px;"></span>
	    <p class="clear"></p>
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>
    <div class="box">
        
        
        <br />
        本网站共公开披露<font color="red">1709</font>个投资事件，未公开披露投资事件<font color="red">41281</font>个，详情请查询<a href="http://www.pedata.cn/" target="_blank">清科私募通</a>。

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

<div class="search search-box">
    <div class="searchinput" style="margin:0;">
        <input type="text" class="input-text" id="searchkey" name="searchkey" value="" style="width:270px;float:left"/>
        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />
        <span id="search-msg" style="font-size:14px; line-height:35px; padding-left:10px;"></span>
	    <p class="clear"></p>
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

    <h1>投资事件</h1>
    </div>
    
    <div class="box-content">
    <div class="search-tag">
        <div class="tag-l">
            <b>行业：</b><a class="forange" href="/inv/">不限</a>
        </div>

    <div class="searchinput" style="margin:0;">
        <input type="text" class="input-text" id="searchkey" name="searchkey" value="" style="width:270px;float:left"/>
        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />
        <span id="search-msg" style="font-size:14px; line-height:35px; padding-left:10px;"></span>
	    <p class="clear"></p>
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

    <div class="searchinput" style="margin:0;">
        <input type="text" class="input-text" id="searchkey" name="searchkey" value="" style="width:270px;float:left"/>
        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />
        <span id="search-msg" style="font-size:14px; line-height:35px; padding-left:10px;"></span>
	    <p class="clear"></p>
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />
        <span id="search-msg" style="font-size:14px; line-height:35px; padding-left:10px;"></span>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

    <div class="searchinput" style="margin:0;">
        <input type="text" class="input-text" id="searchkey" name="searchkey" value="" style="width:270px;float:left"/>
        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />
        <span id="search-msg" style="font-size:14px; line-height:35px; padding-left:10px;"></span>
	    <p class="clear"></p>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

    <h1>投资事件</h1>
    </div>
    
    <div class="box-content">
    <div class="search-tag">
        <div class="tag-l">
            <b>行业：</b><a class="forange" href="/inv/">不限</a>
        </div>
        <div class="tag-r">
            <a href="/inv/h5537/">互联网</a>
<a href="/inv/h4823/">移动互联网</a>

    <div class="searchinput" style="margin:0;">
        <input type="text" class="input-text" id="searchkey" name="searchkey" value="" style="width:270px;float:left"/>
        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />
        <span id="search-msg" style="font-size:14px; line-height:35px; padding-left:10px;"></span>
	    <p class="clear"></p>
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

<div class="box interview box-caption">
   <h2 class="caption"><a target="_blank" href="http://newseed.pedaily.cn/">新芽</a></h2>
<!--PE-Slice:2444-start--><div class="block"><div class="img"><a target="_blank" href="http://newseed.pedaily.cn/201608/201608141326036.shtml"><img src="http://pic2.pedaily.cn/201608/20160814@154848.jpg" class="img-responsive" alt="王宝强离婚背后，关于出轨经济学的严肃讨论"></a></div>
<div class="mark"><div class="topic" onclick="window.open('http://newseed.pedaily.cn/201608/201608141326036.shtml','_blank');"><a href="http://newseed.pedaily.cn/201608/201608141326036.shtml" target="_blank" class="title">王宝强离婚背后，关于出轨经济学的严肃讨论</a><span class="subject">经济学告诉我们，你越是让你的另一半省心，你的另一半就越是看轻你，越是容易抛弃你。因为你没有让她/他对你...</span></div></div></div><!--PE-Slice:2444-end-->

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

<div class="search search-box">
    <div class="searchinput" style="margin:0;">
        <input type="text" class="input-text" id="searchkey" name="searchkey" value="" style="width:270px;float:left"/>
        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />
        <span id="search-msg" style="font-size:14px; line-height:35px; padding-left:10px;"></span>
	    <p class="clear"></p>
    </div>
    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

    <div class="searchinput" style="margin:0;">
        <input type="text" class="input-text" id="searchkey" name="searchkey" value="" style="width:270px;float:left"/>
        <input type="button" id="searchbutton" name="searchbutton" class="btn-search" value="" />
        <span id="search-msg" style="font-size:14px; line-height:35px; padding-left:10px;"></span>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        $(function () {
            var keyobj = $('#searchkey'), search = function () {
                $('#search-msg').html("");
                var wd = $.trim(keyobj.val()), h = location.pathname, ix = h.indexOf('.aspx');
                if (wd.length > 7) {
                    $('#search-msg').html("输入字符太长");
                    return;
                }
                if (ix > -1) {
                    h = h.substring(0, ix + 5) + '?w=' + encodeURIComponent(wd);
                    location.href = h;
                    return;
                }
                h = h.replace(/\/\d+\/?$/, '');
                if (wd != '') {
                    if (h == '/company/all' || h == '/company/all/' && wd != '') {
                        //console.log(h)
                        location.href = '/company/w' + wd; return;
                    }
                    m = h.match(/w([^\/]*)/ig);
                    if (m != null) {
                        h = h.replace(m[0], 'w' + wd);
                    } else {
                        //alert(h);
                        if (validator.trim(h, '/').indexOf('/') == -1 || /(vc|pe)\/?$/ig.test(h)) {
                            h = (h + '/w' + wd + '/').replace('//', '/');
                        } else {
                            var len = h.length;
                            if (h.charAt(h.length - 1) == '/')
                                len--;
                            h = h.substring(0, len) + '-w' + wd;
                        }
                    }
                } else {
                    h = h.replace(/\-w([^\/]*)/ig, '');
                }
                if (h[h.length - 1] != '/')
                    h += '/';
                location.href = h;
            };
            if (keyobj.length > 0) {
                keyobj.keypress(function (e) {
                    if (e.which == 13) {
                        search();
                    }
                });
                $('#searchbutton').click(search);
            }
        });
    </script>

    <script type="text/javascript">
        var box = new LightBox("idBox");
        $(function () {
            $('#idBoxOpen,.showBox').click(function () {
                var module = $(this).attr('m'), url = '/industry.shtml', title = '选择行业分类', txt = box[module];
                if (module == 'city') {
                    url = '/address.shtml';
                    title = '选择地区';
                }
                $('#poptitle').html(title);
                if (!txt) {
                    $.get(url + '?_' + Math.random(), function (s) {
                        box[module] = s;
                        initLinks(s, module);
                    });
                } else {
                    initLinks(txt, module);
                }

                box.Show();
                $obj('lightbox_close').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
                $obj('__global_lay_div').onclick = function () { box.Close(); };
            });

            function initLinks(txt, module) {
                $('#boxBody').html(txt);
                $('#boxBody').find('a').click(function () {
                    var h = location.href, arr = /\/(inv|ipo|ma|pe|vc|people|company|enterprise)\//.exec(h);
                    if (arr != null) {
                        h = h.substring(0, h.indexOf(arr[0]) + arr[0].length - 1);
                    }
                    location.href = h + $(this).attr('href');
                    return false;
                });
            }

        });
    </script>

[线程#0]负责抓取第19页
